title: Delivering the Digital Enterprise
abstract: Over the past 3 to 4 years Platts and the rest of The McGraw-Hill Companies have taken on an initiative to grow the digital capabilities of how content is offered to Platts' customers. Over the past year Platts embarked on a large set of initiatives, one of which was to improve the way Platts delivers news content to customers. Platts will share how they have implemented a  MarkLogic based solution to allow their customers improved capability to access and analyze their content. TCS has developed a number of solutions for their customers and has evolved, based on these experiences, a  Digital Publishing framework that will support the Digital Enterprise of the future.

speakers.name: Michael Seabrooks
speakers.title: Platform Manager, Technology and Program Management
